index.description: A single index from which we want to get the terms in the dictionary.

field.description: The field for which we want tp retrieve the terms from the dictionary

size.description: Number of terms we want to get back

from.description: From where on we want the terms. for exampl, if the term is foo, we will get terms from the next term on that is lexicographically larger.

min_doc_count.description: minimum document frquency a term must have to be retrieved.
